nodes.title: Proposed Networking Meeting agenda for 2023-03-28
nodes.body:
## Meeting Details

- **Date/Time:** March 28st, 2023 @ Tuesday 10:00 AM ET / 15:00 UTC / 4:00 PM CET
- **Location:** Link should be posted in the `#Networking` text and voice channel on Discord at least 5 days before the meeting.
- **Moderator:** @OBWANDO 
- **Note Taker** TBD 

The [FIG Networking Meetings](https://github.com/Open-MV/fig-networking/tree/main/meetings) repo contains the history past meetings, including a link to the agenda, recording, notes, and resources.

## Meeting Agenda
Network protocol and edge replication

## Outcomes from Discussion topics

## Action Items

Explore QUIC and its potential to serve as a primary protocol of communication

## Items for next week's meeting
N/A

## Open Discussion Items

List any additional items below!

nodes.title: Meeting agenda for 2023-02-07
nodes.body:
## Meeting Details

- **Date/Time:** February 7th, 2023 @ Tuesday 10:00 AM ET / 15:00 UTC / 4:00 PM CET
- **Location:** Link should be posted in the `#Networking` text and voice channel on Discord at least 5 days before the meeting.
- **Moderator:** @OBWANDO 
- **Note Taker** @OBWANDO 

The [FIG Networking Meetings](https://github.com/Open-MV/fig-networking/tree/main/meetings) repo contains the history past meetings, including a link to the agenda, recording, notes, and resources.

## Meeting Agenda
First meeting and operating
FIG charter discussion
Database Feature triage

**Discuss agenda from proposed topics**

## Outcomes from Discussion topics

Discussed charter and where resources are and process
Reviewing Database triage, new entry added as suggested by Layl for QUIC
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/QUIC
Potential for data communication protocol between objects
Discussed early prototype bridges for game to game object interaction.

## Action Items

Explore QUIC and its potential to serve as a primary protocol of communication

## Items for next week's meeting
N/A

## Open Discussion Items

List any additional items below!

From the meeting, attaching this image for reference.
Describing potential use of a "omfTF" object format, where it can be used at various stages of communication with clients and game services.
![Screenshot from 2023-02-07 16-20-58](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3094382/217302634-c72981a2-8e88-4ad9-8436-372513c173e3.png)
